output_list.reason: The mintToken function has an integer overflow vulnerability that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The freezeAccount function has an access control vulnerability that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The setPrices function has an access control vulnerability that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The buy function has a random logic that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The sell function has an integer overflow vulnerability that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
